meanings.definition: Not belonging to the same time period as something else.
meanings.sent1: The ancient artifact looked uncontemporary next to the modern sculpture.
meanings.sent2: Her uncontemporary fashion sense stood out at the trendy party.
meanings.sent3: The uncontemporary clock tried to keep up with the digital world.
meanings.sent4: His uncontemporary views on technology were like a relic from the past.
meanings.sent5: The uncontemporary building seemed lost in time amidst the skyscrapers.

meanings.sent1: The uncontemporary phone model was no longer in production.
meanings.sent2: His uncontemporary taste in music favored vinyl records over digital downloads.
meanings.sent3: The uncontemporary hairstyle made her look like a character from a vintage movie.
meanings.sent4: Her uncontemporary choice of typewriter over a laptop was a nod to nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The uncontemporary design of the car resembled a classic from the 1950s.
